name: Special Topics in Womens and Gender Studies
description: An advanced and in-depth seminar dedicated to a topic relevant to Womens and Gender Studies. Students will have the opportunity to explore recent scholarship in a specific content area, which will vary from year to year. Participation in a related project/practicum in the community may be incorporated into the course.
prerequisites: WSTB11H3 and 1.0 credit at the C-level chosen from among the courses that can be used to satisfy requirement 6 of the Major in Women's and Gender Studies
